how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me:
My family and my work as a healthcare professional - these are the most fulfilling things in my life.
However my life wouldn't be complete without my hobbies - literature, music, yoga, bicycling, analogue photography...and many others. Since the 80's, when I shared Atari 800 XE with my brother, I'm interested in computers. During my life on student's dormitory in 00's I discovered the world of open source software and Linux and few years later this experience led me to discovery of cryptocurrencies.
I see Cardano as the 3rd generation and ecologically sustainable cryptocurrency with a huge potential. I made some investments to ADA and right now I'm building a Cardano node (in cooperation with my brother).
about.server: 6 core CPU, 16 GB RAM, 1 TB SSD, 100 Mbit Ethernet, Ubuntu based OS, UPS backup
